short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Populate a ad hoc selection filter in Infinite Campus by using student numbers in a CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Chrome Extension for Infinite Campus SIS users.  This extension allows the user to select a CSV file from their computer and automatically populate a Selection Filter with the values in that CSV file.  Using this extension can transform the menial, time-consuming task of selecting individual students and moving them one at a time into a 10 second task.

______________________
Version 1.0.2 Update:
Added support for IC's "New Look"; maintain support for legacy interface

Version 1.0.1 Update:
Added support for headers that don't match "student_studentNumber" format
